reviews.review: Comprei só de meme pra ver se o que as pessoas falavam sobre o jogo eram verdade..e realmente tirei a minha dúvida,esse jogo é ruim pacas,porém tem historia que também é outra merda..mas fazer o que né meus amigos,errar é humano,mas a valve persiste tanto no erro que parece ser até proposital..
la verdad buen jogo pero lo mejor son los dilogos :) arnia?

I purchased CS bundle on Steam couple of weeks ago. I have been playing CS since high school and I have played all versions (except GO) but CS Condition Zero is by far the best version I like. It is because its graphics are realistic enough to enjoy the game to the fullest and it is not too much detailed as GO (as far as I watched in videos) to lose your focus on the actual game play. I have high respect to developers, and although they will probably not going to read this, I would like to thank every each one of them bringing back my high school memories every time I play.
хорошая версия counter-strike с сюжетным прохождением и достаточно хорошая тренировка для CS:GO

เกมในตำนานที่สนุก โดยเฉพาะเนื้อเรื่อง แม้จะมีติดขัดบ้างบางด่าน อย่าง Ai ขวางทางประตู 55555 (Deleted Scenes)

โดยรวมแล้วสนุก และคลาสสิคดี แอบหวังเล็กๆ กับโหมดเนื้อเรื่อง อยากให้นำมา Remake ใหม่ ในกราฟฟิกที่ทันสมัย ....

Basicamente, um cs 1.6 porém com um modo ''história''. 

Esse modo é bem simples de entender. Você comanda uma equipe de Contra Terroristas, que tem que ir para vários mapas conhecidos do CS, para ''resgatar'' o local. Durante os mapas, você têm desafios para cumprir, como por exemplo: 

-Matar 3 inimigos com uma AWP.
-Resgatar 4 reféns.
-Ganhar um round em menos de 75 segundos.

Infelizmente, o game não possui um modo oficial para jogar como terrorista. Mas, existem packs de mapas que possibilitam isso. Então quem quiser, eu deixarei um link aqui em baixo para quem quiser baixar.

Os gráficos do game são quase iguais ao CS 1.6, porém alguns mapas foram remasterizados e com algumas adições também. Basicamente fizeram um remake de todos os mapas (ao menos os que eu joguei).

Mas de resto, a configuração, jogabilidade e armas são tudo iguais ao seu antecessor, porém com as armas também em hd e remasterizadas.

Link das missões de TR: https://gamebanana.com/gamefiles/download/5622 

Créditos: FoxStalker

Just play csgo or cs source, I was hoping it's campaign was entertaining but I got bored very easily. Not a bad game just play any other Counter Strike.

Computer AI sucks. Sometimes they are not cooperating, sometimes they just score 0-4 with lvl 4 agents with each of his skill "HIGH". Maybe please redefine what does "HIGH" means in this game. Thanks!

Btw, no matter how many times I said I would NOT want a tutor, the game still "kindly" provide a detailed tutor to me.

P.S. Just to let your guys know, the retirement rate of this game was reached an astonishing rate of 40.84% till now.

Update:
the game still sucks.

With countless trials and failures, I eventually beat this game in expert level.
Having AI teammates is just like owning the Schrödinger's cat. Sometimes like Maverick and Steel, they can managed to kill 4 guys in a row. But others like Tex and Bear, they are just dumb as their names.

This game requires huge amount of determination and skill, and there isn't even an achievement system in here nor anything else that can reward player with.

El clasico 1.6 del cyber ahora tiene otro nombre. Y si, el 1.6 de Steam no permite competir con bots, así que este es el más parecido. También hay algunas misiones que aumentan en dificultad de forma escalada y le da una razón más al jugador para superar sus límites. Un buen juego, aunque para muchos no supere al mítico 1.6

CS:CZ is my favorite Goldsrc Counter Strike game since it has two single player modes if you count Deleted Scenes, and it has bots unlike the original Counter Strike. The graphics are better in this game than the OG Counter Strike, and it puts off an old school vibe that I love.

Доведённая до ума 1.6, с необязательными но приятными мелочами вроде какой-никакой одиночной кампании, дающей знакомство со всеми дефолтными картами и вооружением сил бобра, подтянутыми текстурами и слегка осовремененными картами на фоне оригинала. Другое дело что в том же году вышла CS: Source, которая играется явно приятнее. Онлайн всё ещё жив, пусть и достаточно скромен. Покупать же игру как на релизе так и сейчас в общем-то незачем, поскольку последующие игры серии заметно её превосходят, а олдфаги вероятнее засиживались в оригинале.
Counter-Strike 1.6 but with better graphics, bots, a Quake 3-style multiplayer campaign and less players

This game holds up for the time. Only get if you want to play by yourself or with friends though don't expect any full servers.
